subject: SSN3722
description_text:
Is a refund too late for the pedals we ordered?

Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

conversations.body_text:
If I don’t hear back within 24 hours.  I will deem this charge fraud.    Please reply with an update asap. 


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone
Hi Melissa Divine,  Could you please provide your order number? I can check it for you right away.
Hi Melissa Divine,  No need to worry. Please provide the order date and amount, and I will check your order starting with SSN. Normally, we ship orders promptly after they are received.

EYQ98KR0R that was the original order
I just placed another order for the correct product, that order number is 080V0RTYT.  
Can you Please help with shipping on the new order to correct the mistake? 
I would also like to return the initial product order due to it not being correct.   Can you please send me a return label? 


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone
Hi Melissa Divine,    We have confirmed that the shipped product is correct. Please provide photos of the product you received, and we will verify it again for you.

Attached are the pictures.  We order the pro x ultra p3 h3 and received the plus x.   See shipping label vs box picture.  


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

It’s the wrong product   I need a return label for it   Thank you 





Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone
Hi Melissa Divine,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have sent you a return label. Please check your mail.   Tracking number  4209171057349302210499600119652223
Hi Melissa Divine,    Okay, we shall have the warehouse complete the inspection and issue your refund once everything has been verified.

Thank you!


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

It’s been delivered.  Since last week.  Please issue my credit.  Thank you ? 


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone
ID 号为 6381, 6518 和 8433 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单6381  
      主题: Order  
      描述:  I’ve been charged for an order but when I into my order number your system cannot find my order.   
 Please advise  
   
 
   
   
    
Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

合并来自工单6518  
      主题: Received wrong product  
      描述:  Hello,  
 We ordered the below  
 
    
But received the black plus x p3-h3.   
 How can we get the correct product asap?    
Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

合并来自工单8433  
      主题: SSN3528  
      描述:  Hello  
   
 I sent the return a couple of weeks ago.  Did youyou receive the item?  When can I expect a refund? 
   
 Thanks    
Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone

Hi Melissa Divine,     We apologize for the delayed response. Unfortunately, we are unable to process your refund at this time, as it appears you have initiated a chargeback. Please cancel the chargeback first, and we will immediately issue your refund. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

We had two orders due to the original order delivered incorrectly, so I ordered again.  The chargeback wasn’t for this order.  We sent the product back and your company never gave me a refund even after you acknowledged receipt of the product.  


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone
Hi Melissa Divine,    We sincerely apologize for the delay in processing your refund. If possible, we kindly ask that you first cancel the chargeback, and we will promptly issue your refund.
